description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, as well as CSS styles and the main 'App' component. It creates a root React DOM object, attaches it to the DOM element with id 'root', and renders the App component within React's StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React DOM container attached to the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root container.
